nodes.text: The year 28,912 before the Battle of Yavin, also known as 7,541 after the Tho Yor Arrival, was a year in galactic history. That year, Je'daii Master Shall Mar was in the process of writing A Life in Balance, and he philosophized on a Je'daii's need to heed their limits and understand when to use and when not to use the Force.
